alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 08 at 1:20PM MST until November 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Sherman, Wallace, Logan, Greeley and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These strong winds are expected to produce areas of blowing dust reducing visibilities and potentially creating hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
